reply_text:

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was very scared about the extraction because my earlier extractions were very critical. But this time, it happened in blink of an eye. I got both of my upper wisdom teeth extracted at same time. It felt nothing. Thanks to the Doc. Highly motivating and professional, made the whole process very easy and comfortable for me.
Definitely gonna recommend to all.  :)
reply_text:
Thank you for your wonderful feedback! We're delighted to hear that your extraction experience was smooth and comfortable, especially after your previous concerns. It's great to know that Dr. Aniket Gandhi was able to make the process easy and painless for you.

Your recommendation means a lot to us, and we’re grateful for your trust in our care. We look forward to assisting you with any future dental needs.

Best regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: A very warm and friendly approach and very accommodating when it came to convenience of appointment timings.  The treatment was without doubt , precise and professional. Dr. Aniket has a light hand and a painless approach. From a cost point of view, his charges are very competitive and there are no hidden costs or additional charges to surprise you once the treatment commences.
reply_text:
Thank you for your detailed and positive review! We’re delighted to hear that you appreciated the warm and friendly approach, as well as the convenience of appointment timings. It’s wonderful to know that Dr. Aniket’s precise, professional, and painless approach made your treatment experience pleasant.

We also value your recognition of our transparent pricing and competitive rates. Your satisfaction and trust in our services are very important to us.

We look forward to serving you again in the future.

Best regards

review: I went for deep cleaning of stained tooth with tabbaco.Not only did she finish the cleaning as i was in a hurry to go home.She also made sure that I know where I am heading with this addiction, n what will be the effects on my tooth.Thank you practo and thank you madam all worked out so well for me cleaning done in half hour
reply_text:
Thank you for your detailed review. We’re glad to hear that your deep cleaning was completed efficiently and that you found our guidance on the effects of tobacco on dental health helpful. It’s important to us that our patients not only receive excellent care but also understand their treatment and its implications.

We appreciate your feedback and look forward to supporting you with your dental health in the future.

Best regards

review: The explanation at each stage of the process was clear and to the point. Outside of the initial 3-4 day period to acclimatise to the braces no stage of the process involved anything exceeding mild-moderate discomfort. Overall, got the job done, catered to my schedule, not much for me to complain about
reply_text:
Thank you for your thoughtful feedback. We’re pleased to hear that the explanations provided throughout your braces treatment were clear. It's great to know that we were able to accommodate your schedule and meet your expectations.

Your satisfaction is important to us, and we’re glad to have been able to assist you effectively.

Best regards
